snippet: The magazine said that Richard Engel now says that he was kidnapped in 2012 by a Sunni militant group, not forces affiliated with the government of President Bashar al-Assad of Syria, as he originally reported.
abstract: Vanity Fair publishes Editor's Note updating NBC News correspondent Richard Engel's account of his 2012 kidnapping in Syria, noting that he had misidentified his captors; Engel now states that he was abducted by a Sunni, rather than Shiite, militant group.
lead_paragraph: The magazine said that Richard Engel now says that he was kidnapped in 2012 by a Sunni militant group, not forces affiliated with the government of President Bashar al-Assad of Syria, as he originally reported.

headline.main: Vanity Fair Updates Article by NBC Reporter Engel
headline.print_headline: Vanity Fair Alters Article by Reporter for NBC
